title: Web design
description: I create visually stunning and user-centered websites that embody the essence of a brand. My designs prioritize usability and aesthetic appeal, ensuring each element enhances the user experience. I focus on responsive design, making certain that websites perform beautifully across all devices. Using tools like Figma and Adobe XD, I translate ideas into engaging designs that captivate users.

title: Web development
description: I build dynamic and efficient websites that offer seamless interactions and functionality. With expertise in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, along with frameworks like React and Node.js, I develop clean and maintainable code. My approach includes following best practices for performance and security while integrating APIs and backend services to create interactive web applications that meet user needs.

title: Digital Marketing
description: I design and implement strategies to boost online visibility and attract traffic. Utilizing methods such as search engine optimization (SEO), social media marketing, and content marketing, I engage target audiences effectively. By analyzing data and user behavior, I craft customized marketing campaigns that align with business objectives, helping clients connect with and convert their audience through various digital platforms.
